attributes.action: teachers who are incapable of teaching should be sacked
attributes.additional_details:
dearest Government,

I am writing to tell you that I feel and many among me also feel that 'incapable' teachers should not be accepted or tolerated and should be sacked. The teachers may have a degree in their subject but this does not mean that they are able to teach. Communication is a huge deal between a teacher and a student if one cannot understand there is no expectation to learn. control and dicipline is another factor, some teachers cannot control their class and therefore not giving other students a chance in education.

Thank you for reading, I appreciate the time you have taken to do so.
